bogof.Description: Buy one product get one of the same product for free, no need for any parameters.

bulk.Description: Applies a price reduction on each product once you acquire more than the amount stipulated as minimum.

parameters.minAmount: Minimum quantity (inclusive) of the same item you have to buy in order for the promotion to be applicable. Type of number
parameters.discountPerProduct: Price reduction per unit on the product. Type of number.
